title: Animal behaviour: a first film
creator_credit: Norman Bean and Norman Bean Films
brief_description: Animals have behaviour patterns that are caused by stimuli. The film is open ended as the viewer is left to work out the stimuli for various types of behaviour. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
